div.div: Power and wavelet spectra of benthic δ 18O.
div.p:
( A) Power spectra of modeled δ 18O (blue) compared to power spectra of the δ 18O stack of (
3 ) (black) for different time intervals, as indicated above the panels. Wavelet spectra of ( B) the benthic δ 18O stack of (
3 ) and ( C) modeled δ 18O. Black contours indicate the 5% significance level against red noise. The horizontal white lines represent the orbital periods of precession (∼23 ka), obliquity (∼41 ka), and eccentricity (∼100 ka). The model spectra are derived from the average δ 18O computed over all ensemble members resulting from the time-splitting technique.
